name: New Proxima Issue

title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

### Brief:
One line summary for the issue

### Rationale:
Describe the why - what problem are we solving; paint the business context/value.

### Scope:
More open; MVP = boundaries of the problem/change.

### Deliverables:
 - [ ] Deliverable A
 - [ ] Deliverable B
